Desc.entry: Recycles paper, glass, textiles and clothing, shoes, plastics, steel cans, aluminium cans and foil. Also recycles cardboard during farm opening hours. Promotes composting and has compost, manure and compost bins for sale. Training and courses in recycling and composting available. School group activities and open days.
